item.title: This UBS Leader Likes a Lot About the Future, Including the Prospects for Stocks, Alternatives, and ESG
item.description: Suni Harford, head of UBS’ asset-management arm, is retiring after 40 years on Wall Street. What she learned, and what she likes now.

item.title: Japan’s Market Finally Hit New Record. Why It May Not Be Too Late to Get In.
item.description: Strong prospects for Japan’s technology sector, earnings growth, plus structural economic changes could mean further gains ahead for Japanese stocks.

item.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Sells $125 Million of Stock
item.description: Jamie Dimon sold $125 million of JPMorgan stock through a plan, while his wife Judith Kent sold $25 million of stock.

item.title: “What’s the Rush?” to Cut Interest Rates, Asks Fed Gov. Waller
item.description: Higher-than-expected January inflation and a strong economy mean the Fed should wait to lower interest rates, Waller said.

item.title: Intuitive Machines Makes History With Moon Landing
item.description: Intuitive Machines makes history Thursday with a landing near the south pole of the moon.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Soars After Earnings to Set a New High—and a Market Cap Record
item.description: The bar was high for Nvidia’s earnings, and yet the company cleared it easily. These were the key points from the chip maker's earnings.

item.title: Nvidia, Super Micro, Rivian, Lucid, Synopsys, Moderna, Sunrun, Royal Caribbean, and More Stock Market Movers
item.description: Fourth-quarter revenue at Nvidia jumps 265% from a year earlier and data-center revenue surges more than 400%, while shares of Rivian and Lucid fall sharply after the electric-vehicle makers issue production guidance below analysts’ estimates.

item.title: Novavax Stock Soars 25%. A Vaccine Purchase Settlement Is One Reason Why.
item.description: Novavax reaches a settlement related to an advance purchase agreement with Gavi.

item.title: Nvidia’s AI Boom Spurs Tons of Other Stocks
item.description: CEO Jen-Hsun Huang said AI is “enabling a whole new industry.”

item.title: Nice Gets an AI Boost to Earnings and Its Call-Center Software
item.description: Call-center-systems provider Nice posted a strong first quarter, along with robust guidance. It sees new opportunities with the application of artificial intelligence to its core offerings.

item.title: Moderna Stock Jumps on Surprise Profit After Earnings Beat. What to Expect in 2024.
item.description: Moderna reports a profit of 55 cents a share on revenue of $2.8 billion in the fourth quarter, beating analysts’ expectations.

item.title: Tesla Stock Is Outperforming EV Rivals as Musk Takes Swipe at Rivian
item.description: Rivian and Lucid disappointed Wall Street with their production guidance. Their EVs are priced higher than Tesla’s.

item.title: VinFast’s Stock Falls on Strong Guidance. The Drop Is Nothing Like Rivian’s.
item.description: Vietnamese EV start-up VinFast reports fourth-quarter sales of $437 million. Wall Street was looking for about $528 million.

item.title: Nvidia Shows the AI Stock Rally Is Real. Worries Are, Too.
item.description: A fresh wave of tech optimism is fueling Thursday’s surge. J.P. Morgan warns that bulls won’t always be in charge.

item.title: Rivian and Lucid Stocks Are Diving. The EV Story’s New Twist.
item.description: Electric-vehicle start-ups Rivian and Lucid both provided disappointing guidance. The U.S. luxury EV market looks saturated.

item.title: Builders FirstSource Stock Soars on Earnings. Forget the Housing Slowdown.
item.description: The supplier of building materials forecast higher 2024 sales than Wall Street had expected.

item.title: Sunrun Stock Drops After Earnings. How the Fed Can Brighten the Solar Sector.
item.description: Sunnova also posted a disappointing quarterly report after the close Wednesday.

item.title: Remitly Global Stock Surges After Earnings. It’s ‘in the Early Innings’ of Growth Story, Says Analyst.
item.description: The provider of digital financial services tops quarterly revenue estimates.

item.title: Bitcoin Rises as Crypto Traders Look to the S&P 500 and Nvidia
item.description: Bitcoin prices rebound as Nvidia’s standout quarterly results spur gains across stocks.

item.title: Japan’s Nikkei Stock Index Hits Its Highest Level Since the 1980s. Warren Buffett Made the Right Call.
item.description: Optimism about Japan’s economy, its emergence from decades of deflation, and the signs that the central bank will provide plenty of stimulus, mean stocks could keep going higher.
